name: Duck adventures RPG - classic gameboy edition
name_original: Duck adventures RPG - classic gameboy edition
description:
official new edition of the game duck adventures RPG, adapted to the classic gameboy

- ----

unique RPG game created on the Gameboy platform! In the game itself, you play as a duck, the goal of which is to complete all the quests, the tasks given to the player will not be extremely simple, but a true fan of retro games will figure it out with ease, you can play the game online on a PC, or download its ROM to your historical gameboy color (version for black and white gameboy will be released later) ccontrols - start button on PC - Enter. You can move with forward keys and press Z or X to interact.
